name: Chili Liver
author: Domestic Goddess
summary: Besides your typical liver, bacon and onions; this is my 2nd all time favorite liver recipe. It's sooo good. Even when my daughters were young, they ate it, and liked it. Trust me, it's good.
ingredients: 1 pound beef liver, sliced into thin strips
1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed French onion soup
directions: In a large skillet over medium heat, fry bacon until browned and crisp
Remove from pan, cool and crumble
Keep the grease in the pan
Dredge the liver slices in flour seasoned with salt and pepper
Fry liver in the bacon drippings over medium-high heat until browned on the outside
In a small bowl, mix together the French onion soup and chili sauce
Pour the mixture over the liver, cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 15 minutes stirring occasionally until tender
Remove lid, and continue cooking liver to desired doneness
Serve liver and sauce topped with crumbled bacon
